name: How The Heck Do I Become A Space Captain!
name_original: How The Heck Do I Become A Space Captain!
description:
No seriously how do you become a Space Captain?

Play this new turn-based startegy game full of colourful and charismatic characters.

Lead your loyal crew through 4 levels (each one with different objectives!) to demonstrate that you have what it takes to become an official Space Captain!

Get to know the ORTIGA crew! 

https://ortigagames.github.io/OrtigaGames/#page-top
